name: Beer League Hockey
summary: Hey coach, welcome to your local neighbourhood not-so-friendly Canadian hockey league. Build your dream team from a selection of the toughest, roughest, and downright dirtiest group of average Joe’s this side of Shigawake. Face off against other players and become the best better-than-average Beer League hockey club in the world! So what are you waiting for? Lace up, man up and dive into the definitive Canadian hockey experience. Oh, and it’s free eh!
